udział w projekcie międzynarodowym,
stos technologiczny w projekcie: Python, PyTest, Docker, SQL, PL/SQL, NoSQL, AWS,
prowadzenie własnego cyklu życia testów od planowania do wykonania,
projektowanie systemu automatyzacji w celu realizacji planów testowych,
ścisła współpraca z programistami i menedżerami produktu,
stawka do 150-160 zł/h na B2B w zależności od doświadczenia.
 Dobrze odnajdziesz się w naszym zespole, jeśli:   
posiadasz minimum 4 lata doświadczenia w testowaniu oprogramowania,
masz szeroką wiedzę w obszarze metodologii QA, w tym planowania, projektowania, wykonywania i raportowania,
posiadasz znajomość nowoczesnych narzędzi do automatyzacji i testowania (np. Pytest, Requests, Restsharp itp.),
masz doświadczenie w testowaniu backendowych aplikacji internetowych i aplikacji po stronie serwera (API, bazy danych),
posiadasz doświadczenie z Pythonem oraz Big Data,
znasz Dockera,
masz doświadczenie w pracy z relacyjnymi bazami danych tj. SQL i NoSQL oraz AWS (w tym Lambdas/Dynamo DB / S3 / EKS),
posiadasz bardzo dobrą umiejętność pracy z kodem,
dobrze rozumiesz architekturę wielowarstwową, 
płynnie komunikujesz się w j.angielskim (projekt międzynarodowy),

długofalową współpracę - różnorodne projekty (działamy w ramach Software Services, Embedded Services, Data Services, Cloud Services),
możliwość rozwoju kompetencji we współpracy z naszym Center of Excellence, 
dostęp do technologicznych platform e-learningowych - Treehouse, Udemy, Pluralsight,
kursy języka angielskiego - biznesowego lub angielskiego w IT,

Senior Google Cloud Architect
backend.description:
Join Nordcloud and make your mark on the European IT industry. Help our clients thrive on their cloud journey in solution areas such as infrastructure, migration, data, and security.Currently, we are looking for a Senior Google Cloud Architect for our team in Germany.Your daily responsibilities:
Being a technical consultant toward developers and platform users and guiding them in the best use of the Google Cloud
Taking part in the design and implementation of cloud infrastructure solutions and services for our customers’ needs
Your key skills:
Public cloud platform expert knowledge of Google Cloud
A background as Linux OR Windows system administrator or backend developer
Coding/scripting skills (Bash, Python, etc.)
Hands-on experience in creating solution architectures
Designing and implementing landing zone architectures
Infrastructure as code, i.e. Terraform, Deployment Manager, CDK, and similar
Experience in building CI/CD pipelines
Production experience in container orchestration technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Swarm, or OpenShift)
Willingness to experiment with and learn brand-new technologies
Knowledge of on-premises technologies (e.g. VMware, OpenStack, or Hyper-V)
Knowledge of security, network, virtualization, load balancer, storage, and database
Active customer consultant and pre-sales attitude
Fluent communication skills in English and German
What sets you apart (we’d consider any of these a big plus):
At least 1 year public cloud platform expert knowledge of AWS and/ or Azure
Experience and knowledge of General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) or PCI Data Security Standard version 1.2 (PCI DSS)
It’s an extra asset if you know or are willing to know more about Big Data/Machine Learning types of projects
We encourage you to apply, even if you don’t meet all of the requirements. We value your growth potential and enthusiasm!What do we offer in return?
Individual training budget and exam fees for partner certifications
Flexible working hours and remote working model
Laptop and equipment of your choice
Local package such as 30 days holiday allowance, pension allowance, Qualitrain card, and many more
Please read our Recruitment Privacy Policy before applying. All applicants must have the right to work in Germany.About NordcloudNordcloud, an IBM company, is a European leader in cloud advisory, implementation, application development, managed services, and training. We are triple-certified across Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services, and we are recognized as a 'Visionary' by Gartner for Public Cloud IT Services. With 10 European hubs and over 1300 employees, we are known for our innovative cloud-native solutions and we have delivered over 1000 successful cloud projects.Learn more at nordcloud.com and follow the #NordcloudCommunity.

backend.title: Azure Cloud Architect

Join Nordcloud and make your mark on the European IT industry. Help our clients thrive on their cloud journey in solution areas such as infrastructure, migration, data, and security.Currently, we are looking for an Azure Cloud Architect for our team in the Netherlands.Your daily responsibilities:
Implementing cloud infrastructure to deep-diving with our customers by giving workshops and design recommendations to technical teams and stakeholders
You will become a trusted advisor for high-profile enterprises and jointly manage the customer relationship and roadmap with the Nordcloud account team
You will therefore have the opportunity to engage with our customers from the very start of the customer journey to the cloud and own your role in the customer projects until it’s finished
Your key skills:
Entrepreneurial spirit. You proactively look for opportunities to engage yourself in communities and with customers instead of waiting for things to come to you
The naturalness of finding your place within teams and feeling comfortable being the leading voice in a conversation as part of a team
Right-first-time, innovation-driven mindset. You are not content to let things be done “the way they have always been done” and seek to raise the bar with each solution you deliver
Being hungry for knowledge and having a passion for self-improvement. You understand that working with the public cloud involves iterative change and you strive to keep up with the latest changes
Broad knowledge of the overall Azure service catalog
General knowledge of the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework and Enterprise-scale landing zone reference architecture
Demonstrable knowledge of Azure solutions architecture design
Experience working with Azure networking, security, storage, databases, and computing solutions in IaaS and PaaS services
Experience working with container technologies ranging from Azure Web Apps for Containers & Azure Container Apps to Azure Kubernetes Service or equivalent Kubernetes service (EKS/GKE)
Experience working with scripting, automation, infrastructure as code & pipeline as code tools (Terraform, Azure Bicep, YAML, Powershell, Bash)
Experience working with and collaborating within DevOps toolkits (Azure DevOps/GitHub Enterprise)
Experience in backend programming languages (C#, Java, Go, or similar)
Experience working with configuration management systems (Ansible, Chef, Puppet, or similar)
An understanding of on-premises hypervisor and network connectivity technologies such as VMWare and Hyper-V and firewall/VPN devices
Experience presenting technical ideas and solutions to technical and non-technical audiences of all seniority levels

frontend.title: Senior Python Developer
frontend.description:
Employment contract: 10000 - 17000 PLN Gross / per monthB2B Contract: 95 - 155 PLN PLN (+ vat) / hAs a Senior Python Developer, you will dive into the thrilling domain of Fintech, working on migrating projects from Python 2 to 3. You will join an agile and collaborative team devoted to developing cutting-edge trading products. Your tasks will include, but not be limited to, designing and developing interfaces, complex algorithms, and enhancing our trading platform.Your daily work:
Lead the migration project from Python 2 to 3 ensuring smooth transition and minimum downtime.
Design, develop, and maintain interfaces and complex algorithms integral to our trading products.
Contribute to the continuous improvement and evolution of our systems to ensure they stay competitive and compliant with the latest standards and best practices.
Collaborate closely with team members and other departments to deliver high-quality, maintainable, and robust code.
Participate in peer programming, code reviews, and other collaborative activities to foster a strong engineering culture and a learning environment.
Must-have skills & experience:
Strong background in Python development, with significant experience in migrating projects from Python 2 to 3.
Proficiency with databases, particularly MySQL, and a good understanding of MongoDB used in adjacent teams.
Experience with Docker, and knowledge on transitioning to Podman is a plus.
Familiarity with Red Hat hosting and its environment.
Extensive experience with a variety of libraries including cryptography, Cython, lxml, numpy, pymongo, and pymysql.
Proficiency in using Git for version control, with experience in GitLab-based CI/CD workflows.
Nice to have:
Experience in the development of trading platforms or financial systems is a significant advantage, although not essential.
Lifelong learner with a keen interest in exploring new technologies and methodologies.
Excellent problem-solving skills and a collaborative attitude.
Strong commitment to quality, performance, and efficiency.
Why it is worth joining us:
Each of us has 8 days for their personal upskill. This time is just for you to learn a new skill or hone the ones that you already have.
Our people get regular support from several active communities (AWS, Azure, .NET, Java, Frontend etc.) We offer online courses, workshops and conferences to keep their expert knowledge up-to-date. You will also learn a lot on your own thanks to code reviews with your teammates. These practices apply to every project.
There are two areas we excel at : delivering software and building relationships. Our developers and clients are part of our project team. We are not familiar with the phenomenon of Dev-QA wars.
43% of candidates joined Objectivity thanks to the recommendations of our employees. We are happy to see our people recommending their friends - thanks to them we are building a team of experts who enjoy working together.
Cooperation with foreign clients (80% of customers from the British market and 20% from Germany) gives us a great opportunity to use English on a daily basis and interact with different cultures.
We have the opportunity to work with experienced experts. Nearly 50% of our staff are seniors! There is always someone to learn from.
When asked what they like most about Objectivity (after 3 months of work), our new employees usually highlight: friendly atmosphere, committed and helpful people, working with experienced experts, open communication and a solid approach to development.
To find out more:
Check out our Guilds and Tribes structure which helps us to avoid being a corporation.
Moving to Wroclaw? Check out our relocation package.
Check out our benefits.
*„The type of contract shall depend on the actual rules of cooperation established between us during the recruitment process”*“Only employees are entitled to the benefits package.”

frontend.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
frontend.description:
Do you want to have an impact on a product that is used by millions of users across multiple devices on a daily basis?DAZN streams over 40 different sports, from more than 300 different leagues in various markets including Germany, Italy, Japan, Canada, USA, Spain and Brazil (plus many more!).We make learning a fundamental part of the job. Our software engineers continually share their expertise with their colleagues and the wider industry. We’re an active part of the technology community and put a strong focus on innovation. Our people are dedicated, flexible and fast-moving, rising to every challenge that streaming to a global audience of fans brings. We are looking for people like you to join our journey. We are using a micro frontend architecture and our current tech stack includes JavaScript, React, Node, AWS, Node, Docker, Terraform and much more.This role is based in Katowice and you will work on a hybrid basis. You will be part of an international growing team.AS OUR NEW SENIOR FRONTEND ENGINEER, YOU’LL HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO:
Develop tools to assist our international dev teams with their work to support the DAZN 2.0 HTML app on new TV’s and set top box devices.
Be part of a passionate team that own their area of the development of the product and champion ways of working in a scrum environment.
Get involved with every step of a product's lifecycle.
Work in an environment with autonomy where you will plan how to achieve goals that we are all working towards.
Experiment with new technologies.
Support and mentor other developers and team members with their day-to-day work.
YOU’LL HAVE:
In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, ideally with any modern framework.
Experience in developing applications using Vanilla JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, HTML5. 
Knowledge of differences between browsers and experience in cross-platform development (TV / STB / gaming consoles).
Ability to deliver efficient code and analyse performance.
Willingness to do on-device development. Not always but often, you will also have to test your code on an actual device, like a PS5. 
Willingness to explore per devices SDKs, either via specific documentation, per-platform debugging or communication with external partner. 
Familiarity with Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration systems (CI/CD) and good knowledge of software design patterns.
Experience with cloud computing services and distributed applications (preferably AWS), as well as experience with BDD, TDD and Git.
BENEFITS WILL INCLUDE:
Access to DAZN streaming service
Annual performance-related bonus
Annual leave increasing by 3 days after 3 years
Private medical insurance (fully financed by DAZN)
Life assurance
Pension scheme (Pracowniczy Program Emerytalny)
MyBenefit platform (MultiSport and thousands of sports, culture or tourism benefits)
Financially rewarding ‘Refer a Friend’ scheme
Family-friendly community
Opportunity for flexible working
Employee Assistance Program (psychological, managerial, legal and financial counselling)
Free access for you and one other to our workplace mental health platform app (Unmind)
Learning and development resources
Access to our internal speaker series and events
High-end laptops (Macs or Windows)
HERE'S A LITTLE MORE ABOUT US…At DAZN, we bring ambition to life. We are innovators, game-changers and pioneers. So, if you want to push boundaries and make an impact, DAZN is the place to be. As part of our team, you'll have the opportunity to make your mark and the power to make change happen. We're doing things no-one has done before, giving fans and customers access to sport anytime, anywhere. We're using world-class technology to transform sports and revolutionise the industry and we're not going to stop.  DAZN VALUES – THE ‘HOW’ IN WHAT WE DO:   AMBITIOUS – people who want to make a big impact and drive DAZN forward. People who move fast and make success happen.  INVENTIVE – people with bright ideas who deliver great new experiences for our customers – and improvements for our business. People who come up with better, simpler ways of doing things.  PASSIONATE – people who are proud of our product, out content and our business – and love to shout about it. People who love what they do and show commitment every day.  BRAVE – people who take difficult decisions to help us focus on improving DAZN, our performance and our results. People who will take on challenges no matter what is in front of them.  SUPPORTIVE – people who know that we achieve more as a team than as individuals. People value inclusion and look out for each other, helping their colleagues enjoy their work and develop their careers. People who consider others before making decisions. At DAZN, we are committed to fostering an inclusive environment that values equality and diversity, where everyone can contribute and have their voices heard. This means hiring and developing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, age groups, sexual orientations, gender identities and abilities. Everyone has the opportunity to make change and impact our DEI journey by joining our ERGs: Proud@DAZN, Women@DAZN, Disability@DAZN and ParentZone. If you’d like to include a cover letter with your application, please feel free to. Please do not feel you need to apply with a photo or disclose any other information that is not related to your professional experience. Our aim is to make our hiring processes as accessible for everyone as possible, including providing adjustments for interviews where we can. We look forward to hearing from you.

frontend.title: Remote Mid FullStack JS Developer
frontend.description:
We're a forward-thinking tech crew looking for a seasoned Fullstack JavaScript Developer. We value both the nitty-gritty of coding and the broader picture of project execution.Requirements:

Client-Centric Approach: You should have hands-on experience in:
Working directly with clients.
Translating their needs into tangible technical requirements.
Delivering projects that meet commercial standards.
Core Tech Expertise:

Backend: We primarily use Node with NestJS. You should be comfortable building scalable and efficient backend systems with this stack.

Frontend: Our projects leverage the power of React/Next.js. We're expecting you to craft responsive and efficient frontends using these.

Mobile: Given the rising mobile-first approach, experience with React Native is essential. You should be adept at creating seamless mobile experiences for varied device specifications.

English Proficiency: Fluent communication is key. You should be comfortable at a B2 level, both written and spoken. We'll assess this during our chat. Polish native is required.


Soft Skills: Beyond the code:

Collaborative mindset: We work as a team. Sharing knowledge and seeking feedback should be second nature to you.

Problem-solving: Hiccups happen. How you address them matters.

Clear communication: Can you simplify complex tech jargon for clients or non-tech teammates?

Adaptive Thinking: Tech environments are dynamic. Can you adjust your strategies based on new data or unexpected challenges?

Proactive Anticipation: Spotting potential roadblocks ahead of time and devising solutions can save a lot of time and resources.
Additional Qualities (Good-to-have):

Broader Tech Knowledge: Familiarity with other modern frameworks or tools can be a plus. Let us know if you have any specialties.

Agile Experience: If you've worked in agile environments or have been part of scrum teams, it can be advantageous.

Portfolio/GitHub: Show us what you've built or contributed to. It always helps to see tangible work.
Perks & Benefits:

Straightforward Recruitment: We respect your time. Our 3-step process is designed to be quick yet thorough.

Flex Work Environment: Work from anywhere, really. Just ensure you're aligned with sprint goals and deliverables. We trust you to know your best productive times.

Personal Development Budget: Need to upgrade your workstation? Or eyeing a course? We allocate a budget for your professional growth and tools.

Skill Enhancement: We host in-house training sessions, especially for soft skills. It's optional, but we recommend it. Always good to refine those interpersonal skills.
Take The Leap with Your CV... Or Go the Extra Mile!While we're keen to see your CV, we also appreciate those who think outside the box. How about recording a brief video about yourself and your journey so far? If you're more comfortable expressing yourself in Polish, feel free to do so! Taking this initiative won't go unnoticed. In fact, it's precisely the kind of drive and creativity we value.Should you choose this path, we promise you two things:
You'll be bumped up the list and receive priority during our selection process.
You're guaranteed a spot in the first stage of our interview.
It's your chance to stand out. Show us not just what you've done, but who you are.So, ready to get started? Send in that CV or surprise us with something unique! We're excited to see what you bring to the table.

Offer description Hello, let’s meet!
We are Xebia – a place where experts grow. For nearly two decades now, we've been developing digital solutions for clients from many industries and places across the globe. Among the brands we’ve worked with are UPS, McLaren, Aviva, Deloitte, and many, many more.

Formerly we were known as PGS Software. In 2021, we joined Xebia Group – a family of interlinked companies driven by the desire to make a difference in the world of technology.
Xebia stands for innovation, talented team members, and technological excellence. Xebia means worldwide recognition, and thought leadership. This regularly provides us with the opportunity to work on global, innovative projects.
Our mission can be captured in one word: Authority. We want to be recognized as the authority in our field of expertise.
What makes us stand out? It's the little details, like our attitude, dedication to knowledge, and the belief in people's potential – emphasizing every team members development. Obviously, these things are not easy to present on paper – so, make sure to visit us to see it with your own eyes!
Now, we've talked a lot about ourselves – but we'd love to hear more about you.
Send us your resume to start the conversation and join the #Xebia! read more

fullstack.description:
ABOUT USAt CLOUDFIDE, we do everything with data and contribute to pivotal projects for Fortune 500 companies. This is your chance to enhance your skills and leave your global footprint.Our collaborative culture champions your professional growth. Dive into cloud data processing, gain hands-on big data experience, and leverage our team's expertise to drive your professional growth. Here you'll have an opportunity to use advanced technologies to shape client strategies. With CLOUDFIDE, you can amplify your career alongside the industry's best.YOU AREAlways looking at the bigger picture. Your leadership skills are evident, guiding teams with clarity and purpose.Your experience has taught you the importance of balancing innovation with stability. You're proactive, always on the lookout for ways to optimize processes, improve code quality, and ensure the delivery of top-notch software solutions.YOUR IMPACT ZONE
Lead a project focused on visualizing and managing data for US retail networks, enhancing their operational efficiency.
Requirements gathering and transforming them into technical task specification for other developers.
Technical design.
Proposing changes and improvements.
Supervising project documentation.
Team teaching / knowledge sharing / code review.
YOUR TECH TOOLBOX
Strong proficiency in Java and Spring Boot.
Strong proficiency in TypeScript and React.
Familiarity with relational database systems.
Knowledge of security best practices and AuthZ/AuthN mechanisms (especially OAuth2).
Experience with cloud environment (Azure preferred).
Experience as technical leader.
Understanding of network protocols
Familiarity with Linux command line operations.
Proficiency in Git.
Experience with DevOps practices.
Experience with Docker containerization.
HERE'S WHY YOU'LL LOVE CLOUDFIDE

FLEXIBILITY: Enjoy the freedom of working from anywhere, and have a genuine say on our tools, tech, and solutions.

START-UP CULTURE: open communication, creative problem solving and a flat hierarchy.

GROWTH: Skyrocket your career by exploring new territories - you can work on various projects related to Big Data and Cloud.

COLLABORATION: Be part of our diverse, passionate team, where every voice matters.

STABILITY: We're offering more than a job, we're offering a launchpad for your career.

BENEFITS: Kafeteria MyBenefit (and more soon).
EQUAL OPPORTUNITYCLOUDFIDE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.READY TO LAUNCH YOUR CAREER INTO THE STRATOSPHERE?Don't just stand by, hit the "Apply" button and let's accelerate into the future together!

fullstack.title: Fullstack Senior Software Engineer
fullstack.description:
Hello!For our client we are looking for Fullstack Senior Software Engineer (Dutch-speaking). The company is a global leading firm specializing in business process services and digital transformation. They assist clients in optimizing and automating their business processes, leveraging cutting-edge technologies like Robotic Process Automation (RPA).If you want to understand the impact of your work on your clients’ business, if you want to know that your work is going into production to solve concrete problems for real clients, if you want to know the beneficiaries of your work - this is the right role for you.For this role we are seeking an experienced full stack Senior Software Engineer (C#/.Net) to join our delivery team as a project lead. The organisation works with clients to deliver business automation solutions across a wide variety of industries. This role is with our group that focuses on full stack development utilising BPMN workflow and DMN decision automation engines alongside custom development and BP3 products. The role is essentially remote working with a team distributed across Europe (UK, Netherlands, Germany, Portugal, Ukraine), South Africa and United States. Occasional travel to visit customer sites is normal and these can range across Scandinavia, Benelux and UK.Requirements:
Competency in large scale solutions that solve real world problems
Demonstrable success in software development project delivery in a range of business domains
Proficiency in writing professional, documented, and well-tested code
Conversant on software and architectural design patterns
Understands and can articulate how source control, CI/CD, containers, and agile methods fit within the software development landscape
Good verbal and written communication skills for interacting with all levels of external and internal project stakeholders
Experience in a mentoring and leadership role
Bi-lingual in Dutch and English
Located in Netherlands; Able to work from home.
Able to travel within Scandinavia, Benelux, and UK
Highly qualified candidates will have the following:
Skilled with C#/.Net, JavaScript, or TypeScript and their related ecosystems:
NodeJS, Express, NestJS, Angular
SQL and NoSQL technologies
Strong experience with integration technologies:
REST API and JSON schema design
Delivery within cloud computing infrastructure:
Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform
Kubernetes
Exhibits understanding of BPM, BPMN, and DMN technologies
Solutions using Camunda are a plus
Education and Training:Bachelor of Science degree or equivalent in Computer Science or similar technical major, or equivalent professional experienceExperience:
Seven or more years of software development experience
Three or more years experience as a technical lead for software delivery teams
What we offer:
salary €85,000-100,000 (including the 8% vacation allowance)
25 working days paid vacation per year
matching employer pension contributions
chance to work with a global multi-cultural team
remote work (within Netherlands) and flexible hours
company laptop provided
start of the work - from January 2024 but starting our recruiting process now due to notice periods
How the recruitment process looks like?
Behavioral Interview
Technical Interview
Code Exercise
Manager Interview

fullstack.title: Remote Mid FullStack JS Developer
fullstack.description:
We're a forward-thinking tech crew looking for a seasoned Fullstack JavaScript Developer. We value both the nitty-gritty of coding and the broader picture of project execution.Requirements:

Client-Centric Approach: You should have hands-on experience in:
Working directly with clients.
Translating their needs into tangible technical requirements.
Delivering projects that meet commercial standards.
Core Tech Expertise:

Backend: We primarily use Node with NestJS. You should be comfortable building scalable and efficient backend systems with this stack.

Frontend: Our projects leverage the power of React/Next.js. We're expecting you to craft responsive and efficient frontends using these.

Mobile: Given the rising mobile-first approach, experience with React Native is essential. You should be adept at creating seamless mobile experiences for varied device specifications.

English Proficiency: Fluent communication is key. You should be comfortable at a B2 level, both written and spoken. We'll assess this during our chat. Polish native is required.


Soft Skills: Beyond the code:

Collaborative mindset: We work as a team. Sharing knowledge and seeking feedback should be second nature to you.

Problem-solving: Hiccups happen. How you address them matters.

Clear communication: Can you simplify complex tech jargon for clients or non-tech teammates?

Adaptive Thinking: Tech environments are dynamic. Can you adjust your strategies based on new data or unexpected challenges?

Proactive Anticipation: Spotting potential roadblocks ahead of time and devising solutions can save a lot of time and resources.
Additional Qualities (Good-to-have):

Broader Tech Knowledge: Familiarity with other modern frameworks or tools can be a plus. Let us know if you have any specialties.

Agile Experience: If you've worked in agile environments or have been part of scrum teams, it can be advantageous.

Portfolio/GitHub: Show us what you've built or contributed to. It always helps to see tangible work.
Perks & Benefits:

Straightforward Recruitment: We respect your time. Our 3-step process is designed to be quick yet thorough.

Flex Work Environment: Work from anywhere, really. Just ensure you're aligned with sprint goals and deliverables. We trust you to know your best productive times.

Personal Development Budget: Need to upgrade your workstation? Or eyeing a course? We allocate a budget for your professional growth and tools.

Skill Enhancement: We host in-house training sessions, especially for soft skills. It's optional, but we recommend it. Always good to refine those interpersonal skills.
Take The Leap with Your CV... Or Go the Extra Mile!While we're keen to see your CV, we also appreciate those who think outside the box. How about recording a brief video about yourself and your journey so far? If you're more comfortable expressing yourself in Polish, feel free to do so! Taking this initiative won't go unnoticed. In fact, it's precisely the kind of drive and creativity we value.Should you choose this path, we promise you two things:
You'll be bumped up the list and receive priority during our selection process.
You're guaranteed a spot in the first stage of our interview.
It's your chance to stand out. Show us not just what you've done, but who you are.So, ready to get started? Send in that CV or surprise us with something unique! We're excited to see what you bring to the table.

fullstack.title: Lead Fullstack Engineer
fullstack.description:
Company DescriptionWearLinq is a groundbreaking healthcare startup, emerging from Stanford University, on a mission to democratize healthcare. Our integrated ecosystem of hardware, software, and services aims to bridge gaps between patients and healthcare providers. We have successfully launched our first product: an FDA-cleared 6-channel EKG wearable device accompanied by a patient-facing mobile application, offering seamless access to qualified physicians to diagnose and manage arrhythmia and reduce stroke risk. With an exciting pipeline of upcoming solutions for various disease conditions, we are poised for rapid growth. Our team is primarily located in the San Francisco Bay Area and Singapore but are opening an office in Poland and open to working with talent anywhere.Role: Full-stack engineer with backend focusWe are looking for an innovative, self-motivated full-stack developer with a backend focus primarily responsible for our cloud solutions and automation but also creating dashboards and helping with our direct to consumer marketing experiments on our website. This role reports to director of Software but you’ll have a lot of exposure to the entire leadership team with room to grow into our web/backend team lead.Requirements
Minimum of 5 years experience in full-stack development, with a strong focus on backend technologies
Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, or a related field.
Strong skillset in Javascript (TypeScript strongly preferred) and Node.js
Strong experience with AWS and surrounding technologies, datalake a plus.
Experience in managing infrastructure, databases, CI/CD, and DevOps, with a focus on scalability and security.
Modern front-end development with React or similar technologies.
Experience integrating 3rd party solutions using REST, JSON, and other technologies
Strong SQL skills and experience with NoSQL
Ideally data manipulation and visualization experience with python.
Clear documentation to support FDA regulatory submissions.
Strong communication skills in English to liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Responsibilities:
Design and build various high-performance backend servers in microservice and monolith based architectures
Architect and implement data models, API functionality and RESTful interfaces
Help automate dataflows between different entities and organizations while maintaining HIPAA compliance & other security standard like SOC 2
Be responsible for website updates to run experiments with direct to consumer marketing
Develop novel techniques for maintaining high performance across scalable server architectures
Create various dashboards for the management team to guide further product development and sales.
Manage and update existing code bases
Utilize source control management such as GitHub
Collaborate with other developers: iOS, Android, QA and management to develop high-quality products
Engage with cross-functional teams including hardware and medical professionals to ensure a seamless user experience.
Hire additional engineers on the backend/front-end team as necessary while we scale.
Benefits
Competitive salary and equity options.
Comprehensive healthcare package.
Opportunity to work at the forefront of healthcare innovation.
Dynamic and flexible work environment.
Collaboration with a talented team and advisors.
If you are passionate about revolutionizing healthcare and are looking for a challenging role that allows you to make a significant impact, we'd love to hear from you. WearLinq is an equal opportunity employer and we encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.

modern technologies & tools including AI solutions

Offer description WHO ARE WE?
Equiem is an Australian-founded, now a global leader in property technology (‘proptech’). We launched the world’s first tenant experience app for office buildings - a key innovation that helps commercial landlords digitize their buildings and make them exciting, productive and vibrant places to work. Imagine your dream work environment - that is what we help deliver.
Equiem started with two employees and one building in 2011. Today, we have 150+ staff, and our app is live in 600+ buildings across Australia, the UK, the US, Ireland and Canada - including many of the world’s most recognisable skyscrapers and campuses.
Nothing like our product previously existed. It helped revolutionize how landlords engaged with their customers - the people in the building, creating a new category of technology called ‘tenant experience’. Today, ‘TenX’ is a key component of a modern landlord’s strategy.
In an exciting move, Equiem has acquired spaceOS, a European workplace management software company. This is another step towards Equiem substantiating itself as a global leader in the proptech industry.

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?
In return, we offer a fun, cohesive and flexible working environment with a team that thrives on achieving the ambitions we aim for, plus:

Chance to join an experienced SaaS team who are respected and empowered to initiate change
Grow your career in a world-class, progressive business with a product that is second to none
Startup mentality in a global business. Own your role and make it what you want
Flexible work arrangements. We are about outcomes, not clock-watching
14 paid days off, on top of paid public bank holidays
It's important to prioritize our well-being so that you can take a paid day off!

Learning opportunities, conferences, on-the-job training

Stack technologiczny: Java 8, Java 17, Spring, Sprnig Boot, Hibernate, React, TypeScript, GIT, Gradle, REST API, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, ElasticSearch, Kibana.

Podział pracy: 75 % backend, 25% frontend. 

Środowisko pracy: Ubuntu na mobilnej stacji roboczej, IntelliJ IDEA, 2 lub 3 monitory, elektryczne biurko w biurze.

Zespół: 1 Team Leader, 1 Tester, 5 Developerów (mid/senior). 

Zakres obowiązków:

Projektowanie i rozwijanie bezpiecznych rozwiązań internetowych dla banków w obszarach takich jak: płatności globalne, multibank, zarządzanie gotówką, onboarding klientów cyfrowych, aplikacje bankowości korporacyjnej, otwarte API bankowe, innowacyjne dashboardy,
Tworzenie kodu z dużym naciskiem na bezpieczeństwo, wydajność, przegląd, dobrą automatyzację testów, co jest zintegrowane i wdrożone z wykorzystaniem nowoczesnych rozwiązań CI/CD,
Aktywny udział w prototypowaniu nowych rozwiązań i możliwość wdrażania swoich pomysłów w znaczące ulepszenia,
Kontakt z klientami.

fullstack.title: PHP/Magento Developer
fullstack.description:
Co będziesz robićKariera w obszarze konsultingu jest zróżnicowana i stymulująca. Każdy projekt stanowi ciekawe wyzwanie i umożliwia kontakt z nowymi ludźmi, zagadnieniami biznesowymi i technologiami. Jeśli jest to Twój pomysł na typowy dzień pracy, to Accenture jest odpowiednim miejscem dla Ciebie!

Czym będziesz się zajmować?

Udoskonalaniem platformy pod kątem rozszerzalności i skalowalności (np. wielkoskalowe katalogi produktów, zaawansowane rozwiązania cachowania, load balancing itp.), wykorzystując rozwiązania typu: Docker czy Kubernetes.
Budową rozwiązań omnichannel – w tym budową i rozwojem optymalnej warstwy integracyjnej (od strony Magento) z zewnętrznymi systemami wspierającymi e-commerce na szeroką skalę: BI, CRM, 3PL (3rd party Logistics), PSP, pamiętając o wydajności, rozszerzalności i bezpieczeństwie takich komponentów.
Wdrażaniem nowoczesnych rodzajów płatności na platformach e-commerce (ewallet, tokenization, etc.).
Współpracą z technicznymi zespołami dostawców usług.

fullstack.title: Praktyki w Obszarze Integracji Systemów (M...
fullstack.description:
Co będziesz robićDołącz do zespołu Salesforce Business Group w Accenture w którego skład wchodzi zespół integracji Mulesoft – Accenture jest jednym z największych Partnerów Salesforce i Mulesoft na świecie - razem kształtujmy przyszłość wiodących, globalnych przedsiębiorstw, z usług których korzystasz na co dzień. Szukamy doświadczonych oraz innowacyjnych profesjonalistów w obszarze Integracji.
Czym jest Mulesoft?
Mulesoft, to jeden z produktów Salesforce, który umożliwia zintegrowanie systemów, aplikacji i urządzeń w jeden współgrający ekosystem, przy jednoczesnym wsparciu zarządzania pełnym cyklem życia API w organizacji. Według raportów Gartner, Mulesoft jest jednym z najlepszych rozwiązań IpaaS i API Managementu na świecie, który stale sie rozwija.

Czym będziesz się zajmować? 

Realizowaniem innowacyjnych projektów na potrzeby sektorów: finansowego, produkcyjnego, handlowego, telekomunikacyjnego, energetycznego.
Pracą u klienta w zespołach projektowych.
Wspieraniem analityków/senior deweloperów integracji w bieżącej pracy projektowej.


Szczegółowe obowiązki uzależnione są od specyfiki danego projektu i mogą obejmować: 

prace programistyczne dotyczące implementacji integracji, przepływów danych, batch ETL (programowanie, wykonywanie testów jednostkowych, programowanie testów automatycznych, opracowanie dokumentacji technicznej, wsparcie deweloperskie testów integracyjnych, wsparcie wdrożenia),
wsparcie projektowania i budowy integracji systemów informatycznych (m. in analiza, wsparcie przygotowania architectury, przygotowywanie specyfikacji interfejsów).

fullstack.title: Salesforce Developer
fullstack.description:
What you will doIs your current job boring, or are you looking for a new challenge?  
Join Accenture and become part of the huge Salesforce project ecosystem. We work for some of the largest companies in the world, implementing solutions that are used by hundreds of millions of people every day. Whether you're walking into your local store, logging into your bank, or ordering plane tickets, there's a good chance you're using Salesforce implemented by our team :) 
If you like dynamic work environment - we have lots of projects, challenges - it's easy to change your career path and work in well-organized, international environment. Apply to us! We will call you back and talk about specifics! 
We offer various forms of cooperation, work in our modern offices in Lodz, Katowice, Krakow, Warsaw, or fully remotely. 

What can we offer you? 

Participation in the implementation of projects on a global scale for the largest international companies from Fortune500 using the latest technological solutions and tools.
Opportunity to work for the biggest Salesforce #1 Alliance Partner worldwide.
Become part of a team of Salesforce professionals.
Flexible form of employment (B2B or employment contract).
A wide training package - we provide full financing of Salesforce courses and certifications, technical and soft training.
Additional activities within the framework of Happiness at work and sports initiatives.
Private medical care, life insurance and employee share program.
Access to the My Benefit platform (possibility of using a wide range of products and services, including the Multisport card).
Paid employee referral program.
Employee Assistance Program - free support in one-time legal, financial and psychological consultations.
Individual support of a Career counselor and a specific path of professional development, as well as the possibility of a session with a Coach.


What will you do? 

Programming on the Salesforce platform (depending on your specialty - backend / frontend / full-stack).
Teamwork.
Continuous development of your competencies.
Learning new technological areas within a wide range of projects on the Salesforce platform.
